docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Bronx Woman Convicted in Starving of Her Breast-Fed Son'' (news article, May 20):
docs.abstract: Dr Wendy Chavkin letter on May 20 article deplores prosecution of Tabitha Walron for starving breast-fed son and scores New York City for improperly denying Medicaid to welfare recipients
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''Bronx Woman Convicted in Starving of Her Breast-Fed Son'' (news article, May 20):
